title: Sovereign hill
creator_credit: Nine Network, Penny Spence and Peter Dodds
brief_description: Filmed on location at Sovereign Hill, Ballarat, this Australian documentary recreates the nineteenth century to explain the historical events surrounding gold discovery in Australia. Produced with the assistance of the Management and Friends of Sovereign Hill Gold Mining Township. A study guide accompanies the video.
